text.text_translated:
Maybe dreams happen for a reason.
Our mind puts our thoughts from the day in order.
But in dreams, these thoughts have a special meaning.
When we are not sleeping, we think with words.
It is like we talk to ourselves in our head.
But when we are sleeping, our brain changes.
One part of our brain is for words.
This part works less when we sleep.
Another part of our brain is for feelings.
This part works more.
